newsitem.title: GERMANY: Reuters 8th ex-Frankfurt air cargo market report.
newsitem.headline: Reuters 8th ex-Frankfurt air cargo market report.

text.p: Below are the current average ex-Frankfurt(FRA) German mark air cargo rates per kg for a 100kg shipment, with a volume to weight ratio of six-to-one.

* The rates quoted in this report were obtained by Reuter journalists on a confidential basis from a range of airlines, large forwarders and smaller air cargo agents based at or near Frankfurt Airport.
* All prices are quoted in German marks.

* The tariffs represent average rates calculated from a range of prices, including standard, discount and spot rates, and are indicative of current market activity. --Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax +44 171 542 5017
